snippet.title: PC Engine Longplay [182] Märchen Maze
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by Tsunao

Cute game by Namco.

Kinda like Alice in Wonderland, but more cuter!  I think there's a mirror involved or something.  Japanese.  No plot.

Port of an arcade game.  Topdown instead of isometric.  You shoot marbles and enemies and you jump.  Simple stuff.  Game gets REALLY hard. -_-

This longplay no-skills the game. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
